children.text: The gas piping is being crossed, or in direct contact with the electrical wiring.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 5601 Gas Installation, clause 5.3.4 Separation from Above-Ground Electrical Equipment states that
‘There shall be at least 25mm separation between any consumer piping and any above-ground electrical wire or cable not in a conduit’.
The electrical wiring and gas pipes need to be separated from each other at all locations.
